bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates of golang-github-magiconair-properties for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.
golang-github-magiconair-properties-1.5.3-5.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-601d89df7e
golang-github-magiconair-properties-1.5.3-5.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-bbfc0a6da8
golang-github-magiconair-properties-1.5.3-5.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-5099b1034d
golang-github-magiconair-properties-1.5.3-5.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-58bc66cb1e

golang-github-magiconair-properties-1.5.3-5.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-bbfc0a6da8
